item.title: Predicting future medical diagnoses with RNNs using Fast AI API from scratch
item.description: by: Sparkle Russell-Puleri In the first part one of this tutorial we created a rough template of the Doctor AI: Predicting Clinical Events via Recurrent Neural Networks paper(2016) by Edward Choi et.al. In this tutorial we took it a step further using the Fast.ai buttom up approach. This code is fully functional and details on how the data was processed can be accessed in part one. Load Data About the data set
